Strapi CMS template

Easy setup of your CMS with custom collections and data sample preload.

Just install with a single command line and you are ready to work.

Key facts

Local development

Going full static you don't need to deploy Strapi CMS to production, saving cost of expensive infrastructure.

Deploy support

If your choice is not to go full static you can still deploy Strapi CMS to the cloud.

Leading Technology

As leading technology Strapi CMS has been the CMS choice since the first time.
